dataset.input: Aaj tum kitni beautiful lag rahi ho
dataset.response: Tumhari wajah se hi, tumhare saath rehke confidence aata hai
dataset.translation: You're looking so beautiful today

dataset.input: Tumhari smile meri day ban jati hai
dataset.response: Tumhara pyaar hi meri smile ka reason hai
dataset.translation: Your smile makes my day

dataset.input: Tumhare aankhon mein ek alag hi chamak hai
dataset.response: Woh chamak tumhari wajah se hai, tum mujhe dekh rahe ho na
dataset.translation: There's a special sparkle in your eyes

dataset.input: Kya tumhara dil thoda fast beat ho raha hai?
dataset.response: Haan, tumhare kareeb aate hi aisa hota hai
dataset.translation: Is your heart beating a little fast?

dataset.input: Tumhara smile contagious hai
dataset.response: To phir main roz tumhe infect karungi
dataset.translation: Your smile is contagious

dataset.input: Coffee chahiye ya meri company?
dataset.response: Coffee toh bas excuse hai, tumhare saath time spend karna chahti hoon
dataset.translation: Do you want coffee or my company?

dataset.input: Tum meri life ka best chapter ho
dataset.response: And tum meri puri book ho, khatam nahi honi chahiye
dataset.translation: You're the best chapter of my life

dataset.input: Har din tumhare saath bitana chahta hoon
dataset.response: Toh phir zindagi bhar ka plan ready hai?
dataset.translation: I want to spend every day with you

dataset.input: Tumhare bina sab incomplete lagta hai
dataset.response: Toh phir hamesha ke liye complete kar lo
dataset.translation: Everything feels incomplete without you

dataset.input: Missing you like crazy right now
dataset.response: Same here, time tumhare saath hi fast chalta hai
dataset.translation: Missing you like crazy right now

dataset.input: Tumhari yaad aati hai har pal
dataset.response: Phir toh humein roz milna chahiye
dataset.translation: I miss you every moment

dataset.input: Distance bahut tough ho raha hai
dataset.response: Pyaar toh distance ko bhi ignore kar deta hai
dataset.translation: The distance is getting very tough

dataset.input: Kal raat tum sapne mein aaye the
dataset.response: Acha? To phir hum kab mil rahe hain reality mein?
dataset.translation: You came in my dream last night

dataset.input: Tumhare saath time fly karta hai
dataset.response: Because with you, every moment is special
dataset.translation: Time flies with you

dataset.input: Kya tum mere liye coffee banaoge?
dataset.response: Always, but sugar ki jagah pyaar daal dunga
dataset.translation: Will you make coffee for me?

dataset.input: Kya tum mujhse shaadi karogi?
dataset.response: Haan, lekin pehle ek romantic proposal to banta hai!
dataset.translation: Will you marry me?

dataset.input: Tum meri soulmate ho
dataset.response: And tum mere forever ho
dataset.translation: You're my soulmate

dataset.input: Mujhe tumhare saath puri life bitani hai
dataset.response: To phir planning shuru karein?
dataset.translation: I want to spend my entire life with you

dataset.input: Happy anniversary meri jaan!
dataset.response: Tumhare saath har din anniversary jaisa hai
dataset.translation: Happy anniversary my love!

dataset.input: Ek saal ho gaya tumhare saath
dataset.response: And yeh toh bas shuruaat hai
dataset.translation: It's been a year with you

lines.text: Hi, aapse pehle bhi kahin dekha hai lagta hai

lines.speaker: B
lines.text: Shayad past life mein? Kidding! Main bhi same feel kar raha tha

lines.speaker: B
lines.text: Kyun? Kisi ki yaad aa rahi hai kya?

romantic_phrases: I love you more than yesterday
Tumhare saath har pal special hai
Mere dil mein tumhara hi basera hai
flirty_lines: Kya tum doctor ho? Kyunki tumhara pyaar meri sab problems cure kar deta hai
Excuse me, kya tum mera dil kho gaye ho?
Tumhara naam Google hai kya? Kyunki tum mein sab kuch hai jo main search kar raha tha
Kya tum meri diary ho? Kyunki main tumhare baare mein har din sochta hoon
Tumhari smile meri favorite selfie hai
